refnamediv.refpurpose: service-side interface for the Room List channel type

refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Many instant messaging protocols allow named chatrooms to be listed. This section documents the auto-generated C wrappers for the Room List channel type.

refsect2.title: TpSvcChannelTypeRoomList
refsect2.para: Dummy typedef representing any implementation of this interface.

refsect2.title: tp_svc_channel_type_room_list_get_listing_rooms_impl ()
refsect2.para: The signature of an implementation of the D-Bus method GetListingRooms on interface org.freedesktop.Telepathy.Channel.Type.RoomList.

listitem.simpara: Used to return values or throw an error

refsect2.title: tp_svc_channel_type_room_list_implement_get_listing_rooms ()
refsect2.para: Register an implementation for the GetListingRooms method in the vtable of an implementation of this interface. To be called from the interface init function.

listitem.simpara: A class whose instances implement this interface
A callback used to implement the GetListingRooms D-Bus method

refsect2.title: tp_svc_channel_type_room_list_return_from_get_listing_rooms ()
refsect2.para: Return successfully by calling dbus_g_method_return(). This inline function exists only to provide type-safety.

refsect2.title: tp_svc_channel_type_room_list_list_rooms_impl ()
refsect2.para: The signature of an implementation of the D-Bus method ListRooms on interface org.freedesktop.Telepathy.Channel.Type.RoomList.

listitem.simpara: Used to return values or throw an error

refsect2.title: tp_svc_channel_type_room_list_implement_list_rooms ()
refsect2.para: Register an implementation for the ListRooms method in the vtable of an implementation of this interface. To be called from the interface init function.

listitem.simpara: A class whose instances implement this interface
A callback used to implement the ListRooms D-Bus method

refsect2.title: tp_svc_channel_type_room_list_return_from_list_rooms ()
refsect2.para: Return successfully by calling dbus_g_method_return(). This inline function exists only to provide type-safety.

listitem.simpara: Used to return values or throw an error

refsect2.para: Register an implementation for the StopListing method in the vtable of an implementation of this interface. To be called from the interface init function.

listitem.simpara: A class whose instances implement this interface
A callback used to implement the StopListing D-Bus method

refsect2.title: tp_svc_channel_type_room_list_return_from_stop_listing ()
refsect2.para: Return successfully by calling dbus_g_method_return(). This inline function exists only to provide type-safety.

refsect2.title: tp_svc_channel_type_room_list_emit_got_rooms ()
refsect2.para: Type-safe wrapper around g_signal_emit to emit the GotRooms signal on interface org.freedesktop.Telepathy.Channel.Type.RoomList.

refsect2.title: tp_svc_channel_type_room_list_emit_listing_rooms ()
refsect2.para: Type-safe wrapper around g_signal_emit to emit the ListingRooms signal on interface org.freedesktop.Telepathy.Channel.Type.RoomList.
